alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN PRICE COUNTY THROUGH 200 PM CDT... At 123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tripoli, to Ladysmith, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning, wind gusts up to 30 mph, heavy rain, and half inch diameter hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogema, Prentice, Spirit, Catawba, Kennan, Brantwood, Cranberry Lake, and Wilson Lake Near Phillips. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
